lead_paragraph: The Academy of Television Arts and Sciences awarded a 2007 creative arts prime-time Emmy to “Animals,” a 60-second commercial for the American Express Company that features Ellen DeGeneres. The spot was created by Ogilvy & Mather Worldwide, New York, part of the WPP Group. Other commercials that competed in the category included spots for Cingular Wireless, Coca-Cola and General Electric.
